item.title: MSc Artificial Intelligence
item.description: Core modules: Ethics, Privacy, AI in Society Introduction to Machine Learning Introduction to Symbolic Artificial Intelligence MSc Software Engineering Practice and Group Project Python Programming Individual Project Optional modules: Computational Finance Computer Vision Databases Deep Learning Machine Learning for Imaging Maths for Machine Learning Principles of Distributed Ledgers

item.title: BSc Mathematics, Operational Research, Statistics and Economics
item.description: Awards First Class Honours - overall grade 84% Department of Statistics Academic Excellence Award 2019 for overall performance 3rd out of 250 students. Ranked 1st out of 537 students in Warwick Business Schoolâ€™s Foundations of Finance. Full list of modules Mathematics Year 1 Linear Algebra Mathematical Analysis Sets and Numbers Mathematical Techniques Year 2 Mathematical Methods Operational Research Year 1 Mathematical Programming I Year 2 Mathematical Programming II Year 3 Applied Optimisation Methods Simulation Statistics Year 1 Statistical Laboratory I Introduction to Probability Year 2 Stochastic Processes Mathematical Statistics Part A Mathematical Statistics Part B Linear Statistical Modelling Year 3 Professional Practise of Data Analysis Multivariate Statistics Programming for Data Science Generalised Linear Models for Regression and Classification Economics, Finance and Game Theory Year 1 Introduction to Quantitative Economics Year 2 Foundations of Finance Mathematical Economics 1A Mathematical Economics 1B Games, Decisions and Behaviour Year 3 Actuarial Methods Finance and Financial Reporting

item.title: Chinese Language Institute
item.description: During my final year of school, I found it difficult to choose what I wanted to study at university. Therefore I decided to take a year out to give myself time and life experience before making my choice. Having decided to take a year out, I now had to decide what to do with it. I wanted to do something that I would never be able to do at any other point in my life.
